casebody.data:
NORTH CAROLINA FARM BUREAU MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY, INC. and North Carolina Insurance Underwriting Association
v.
Ronnie D. LILLEY, Sr. No. 51P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 John M. Kirby, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Lilley, Ronnie D. (Sr.) Matthew J. Gray, Attorney at Law, Angela Farag Craddock, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Robert D. Whitney, Attorney at Law, for North Carolina Farm Bureau Mutual Insurance Company, Inc., et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 20th of February 2018 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
